means: 有意（purpose的过去式与过去分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: He purposed that he would marry after graduation.
He purposed to both charm and astonish me by his appearance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是想以他的外貌让我着迷,使我吃惊.

sentence.Network_en: He purposed to become one of the world's leading conductors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他意欲成为世界主要领导者之一.

PerfectNetExp.abs: He purposed to open / opening a bookstore ., 他下定了目标要开一家书店.

list.abs: 北京华纳百川科技有限公司 ... 团队精神 Team spirit 企业宗旨 Enterprise Purpose 企业理念 Enterprise Concept.
考博英语词汇 ... on end 竖立着；立；连续不断 on purpose 故意；意欲 on the contrary 正相反；然而；可是；相反地.
main pump 主泵main purpose 主要目的main push-towing rope 主推拖缆
目录 1 2 3 ▪ ▪ ▪ 4 1简介Skopos这一术语通常用来指译文的目的，Skopos一词来源于希腊语目的“Skopos“。除了Skopos，还使用了相关的“目标(aim)“、“目的(purpose)“、“意图(intention)“和“功能(function)“等词。为了避免概念混淆，提议对意图和.

auth_sentence.content: They purposed to strike from Niagara.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They purposed to strike from Niagara.

auth_sentence.content: Solid biofuels burned for heat will displace liquid fossil fuels that can then be re-purposed for transportation uses.
auth_sentence.res_content: Solid biofuels burned for heat will displace liquid fossil fuels that can then be re-purposed for transportation uses.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Solid biofuels burned for heat will displace liquid fossil fuels that can then be re-purposed for transportation uses.
